velocity.only-online-mode.text: This server only accepts connections from online-mode clients.

extra.text: Did you change your username? Sign out of Minecraft, sign back in, and try again.

velocity.no-proxy-behind-proxy.text: Running Velocity behind Velocity isn't supported.

velocity.already-connected.text: You are already connected to this proxy!

velocity.moved-to-new-server.text: You were moved from the server you were on because you were kicked.
